Activity: Quick review of the project plan before heading to the office.
Check emails. Respond to urgent inquiries. Prepare materials for executive review meeting.

Meeting with @cio-1 and @coo-1: Present the draft project plan, highlighting key milestones, dependencies, and potential risks. Get feedback and approval on the overall strategy and timelines. Address concerns regarding resource allocation and budget.
Incorporate feedback from the CIO and COO into the project plan. Refine timelines and milestones based on their input.
Lunch. Networking call with a contact in another hedge fund to discuss project management best practices.
Meeting with @facc-1 and @facc-2: Discuss fund accounting and reporting requirements. Establish a timeline for setting up the necessary accounting infrastructure.

Meeting with @mkt-1 and @ir-1: Discuss marketing and investor relations strategy. Gather information about target UHNWI investor profiles and communication preferences. Set preliminary deadlines for marketing material creation.
Update project plan with accounting and marketing/IR milestones. Prepare a presentation for the team kickoff meeting.
Send out a company-wide email inviting all members in the company to the project kickoff meeting for tomorrow @PEOPLE.
Leave office. Dinner with industry colleagues.
